alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu; East Cameron; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 10:18AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Cameron and south central Calcasieu Parishes through 1045 AM CDT... At 1018 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Grand Chenier to near Sabine National Wildlife. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cameron, Grand Lake, Lacassine National Wildlife Refuge, Sabine National Wildlife, Hackberry, Holly Beach, Hacketts Corner, Creole, Heberts Marina, Sweet Lake, Gibbstown and Constance Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
